Posts.EditableText:
Is there a trick to using muti-word verbs such as sit on? Do you need to put them in 'put on' or something else? 

As Im going through the tutorial is states to add a verb sit on, when I try that, and run it, the game tells me it does know see the object, its not here.

Thanks!
Posts.HTML:
Is there a trick to using muti-word verbs such as sit on? Do you need to put them in 'put on' or something else?

As Im going through the tutorial is states to add a verb sit on, when I try that, and run it, the game tells me it does know see the object, its not here.

Thanks!

Posts.EditableText:
There's no trick to it - you set them up in the same way as one-word verbs.

I'm not sure where you're going wrong, but if you send me your ASL file I'll take a look into it for you.
Posts.HTML:
There's no trick to it - you set them up in the same way as one-word verbs.

I'm not sure where you're going wrong, but if you send me your ASL file I'll take a look into it for you.

Posts.EditableText: I figured it out user error, I deleted it but did not completely delete the code so it was causing problems. Everything is fine now.
Posts.HTML: I figured it out user error, I deleted it but did not completely delete the code so it was causing problems. Everything is fine now.
